attributes.action: Remove the country from the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I advise that the British goverment removes the UK from the European Union. All that will eventually happen will be that the UK will be taken over and merged into the european state. This will mean that we arn't making our own laws etc...but that they are been made through brussels and will relinqish us f all  soverign rights

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
